title: engE kANbEnO
sahitya:
engE kANbEnO iraivA unai nAn


anupallavi

  ingenrum angenrum eTTu madavAdattil eTTi nIndiyum kiTTavillaiyappA


caraNam    selvap-pon mALagai serukkinilO veyya serukkaLa vIrarin urukkinilO 
perum kavik-kaDalgaLin tarukkinilO iLam kAdalarin kAmap-perukkinilO
kallinilO pashum pullinilO uLLak-karuvinilO kOyil uruvinilO ayyA
